name: Estelar End
description:
A nearby star just exploded, trowing all the universe at your little planet.  Activate the new satellite and control your orbital cannon, defending yourself as much as you can until your imminent destruction.

Your orbital cannon has 25 different types of ammunition, but these change randomly for your score. Prepare to destroy them with a powerful laser, a flamethrower, multiple cannons, arrows and . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . bubbles?


Get ready to shoot the space objects floating towards you like meteorites, comets and big planets. also artificial satellites, space stations and a fleet of aliens. All of these will be slowed down by your atmosphere which will give you some time.
